name: Sales
description: For account executives managing a pipeline of deals. Tracks deal value, pipeline stages, close dates, and buyer engagement to surface deal risks and coaching opportunities.

stakeholderRoles.label: Champion
stakeholderRoles.description: Internal advocate who sells when you are not in the room

stakeholderRoles.label: Economic Buyer
stakeholderRoles.description: Person with budget authority who can say yes when everyone says no

stakeholderRoles.label: Decision Maker
stakeholderRoles.description: Final authority on the purchase decision

stakeholderRoles.label: Technical Evaluator
stakeholderRoles.description: Assesses technical fit, runs POCs and evaluations

stakeholderRoles.label: Coach
stakeholderRoles.description: Provides insider information about the buying process

stakeholderRoles.label: Procurement / Legal
stakeholderRoles.description: Contract reviewers and final gate before signature

stakeholderRoles.label: End User
stakeholderRoles.description: Person who will use the product daily

stakeholderRoles.label: Blocker
stakeholderRoles.description: Person actively opposing or slowing the deal

internalTeamRoles.label: AE
internalTeamRoles.description: Account Executive — owns the deal from discovery to close

internalTeamRoles.label: SDR/BDR
internalTeamRoles.description: Sales Development Rep — qualifies leads, books meetings

internalTeamRoles.label: SE
internalTeamRoles.description: Sales Engineer — technical demos, POC support

briefingEmphasis: Focus on pipeline movement, stalled deals, and upcoming close dates. Prioritize high-value deals approaching deadlines. Flag stage regressions and champion disengagement.
